name: Foolproof Chocolate Fudge
author: Eagle brand
summary: This classic and truly foolproof fudge recipe will be a favorite for years to come. Try one of our suggested variations or personalize the fudge by adding your favorite ingredients to the basic recipe. Fudge also makes a great homemade gift to share with family and friends.
ingredients: 1 (14 ounce) can EAGLE BRAND® Sweetened Condensed Milk
directions: In heavy saucepan, over low heat, melt chocolate chips with sweetened condensed milk and salt
Remove from heat; stir in nuts (optional) and vanilla
Spread evenly into wax-paper-lined 8- or 9-inch square pan
Life fudge out of pan and place onto cutting board; peel off paper and cut into squares
